front.title: Fast Handover based on Registration in advance for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This memo proposes an alternative handover scheme in Proxy Mobile IPv6(PMIPv6) by making NMAG early registering to LMA before MN attaches to NMAG. Therefore, when MN handover to NMAG, it can sends the Router Advertisement message to MN immediately, because the network-layer handoff has completed already.
